Deluge.description:
Deluge is a movie downloader for bittorrent users.

Based on a custom docker image: https://hub.docker.com/r/linuxserver/deluge, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/config.description: Choose a Share for Deluge configuration. Eg: create a Share called Deluge-config for this purpose alone.
/config.label: Config Storage

/downloads.description: Choose a Share for Deluge downloads. Eg: create a Share called Deluge-downloads for this purpose alone.
/downloads.label: Download Storage

PGID.description: Enter a valid GID to use along with the above UID. It(or the above UID) must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID to run Deluge as.

PUID.description: Enter a valid UID to run Deluge as. It must have full permissions to all Shares mapped in the previous step.
PUID.label: UID to run Deluge as.
